description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，曾任山东省人民政府副省长，现任中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组组长，公安部党委委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Han ethnicity, who previously served as the Vice Governor of the Shandong Provincial People's Government. She currently serves as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI and NSC in the Ministry of Public Security and is a member of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 山东省下辖的县级市，为任爱荣的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Shandong Province, and the birthplace of Ren Airong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央纪委国家监委驻国家安全部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻国家安全部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 由中央纪委国家监委派驻中华人民共和国国家安全部的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The discipline inspection and supervision agency dispatched to the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 由中央纪委国家监委派驻中华人民共和国公安部的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The discipline inspection and supervision agency dispatched to the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees public security work nationwide.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选举产生的中央纪律检查委员会。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection elected at the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔，是人民警察的高级警衔之一。
description.en: A police rank of the People's Police of the People's Republic of China, one of the high-level police ranks.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市，以法学为特色和优势的多科性大学。
description.en: A multi-disciplinary university located in Beijing, China, with a focus and strength in law.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管市场监督管理和行政执法工作的直属机构，现已撤销并入国家市场监督管理总局。
description.en: Formerly a direct subordinate agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for market supervision, administration, and administrative law enforcement. It has been dissolved and its functions merged into the State Administration for Market Regulation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、培养中高级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。
description.en: The highest educational institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China for training middle and senior leading cadres and cadres of Marxist theory.

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局直属的出版单位。
description.en: A publishing house formerly under the direct administration of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局

zh-cn: 国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局

description.zh-cn: 原国家工商行政管理总局内设机构，负责反垄断与反不正当竞争执法工作。
description.en: A former internal department of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce responsible for anti-monopoly and anti-unfair competition law enforcement.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，任爱荣在中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组组长职务上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Ren Airong as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI and NSC in the Ministry of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，任爱荣在国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局局长职务上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Ren Airong as the Director of the Anti-monopoly and Anti-unfair Competition Enforcement Bureau of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，任爱荣在国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局局长职务上的继任者。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the successor of Ren Airong as the Director of the Anti-monopoly and Anti-unfair Competition Enforcement Bureau of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，任爱荣在中国工商出版社社长职务上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Ren Airong as the President of the China Industry and Commerce Press.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，任爱荣在中国工商出版社社长职务上的继任者。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the successor of Ren Airong as the President of the China Industry and Commerce Press.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家工商行政管理总局

position.zh-cn: 干部、副处长、处长、副局长
position.en: Cadre, Deputy Division Chief, Division Chief, Deputy Director

description.zh-cn: 曾两次在中央党校参加中青年干部培训班学习。
description.en: Attended training programs for young and middle-aged cadres at the Central Party School on two occasions.

relationships.target: 国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局

position.en: Vice Governor, Member of the Party Leadership Group

relationships.target: 中央纪委国家监委驻国家安全部纪检监察组
中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组
中华人民共和国公安部
中国共产党第二十届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 拥有副总警监警衔。
description.en: Holds the rank of Deputy Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 任爱荣接替孙新阳担任中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组组长。
description.en: Ren Airong succeeded Sun Xinyang as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI and NSC in the Ministry of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 任爱荣接替宁望鲁担任国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局局长。
description.en: Ren Airong succeeded Ning Wanglu as the Director of the Anti-monopoly and Anti-unfair Competition Enforcement Bureau of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 任爱荣担任的国家工商行政管理总局反垄断与反不正当竞争执法局局长职务由杨红灿接替。
description.en: Yang Hongcan succeeded Ren Airong as the Director of the Anti-monopoly and Anti-unfair Competition Enforcement Bureau of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 任爱荣接替王景明担任中国工商出版社社长。
description.en: Ren Airong succeeded Wang Jingming as the President of the China Industry and Commerce Press.

description.zh-cn: 任爱荣担任的中国工商出版社社长职务由崔守东接替。
description.en: Cui Shoudong succeeded Ren Airong as the President of the China Industry and Commerce Press.
